getting-started/initial-configuration.title: Initial Configuration
getting-started/initial-configuration.description: After completing the Quick Start, configure Bedrock CMMC to match your organization's specific requirements and compliance goals.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start Guide
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get started with Bedrock CMMC in just a few minutes. This guide will walk you through the essential steps to begin your CMMC compliance journey.

installation/installation.title: Installation Guide
installation/installation.description: This guide walks you through the installation process for Bedrock CMMC.

installation/integrations.title: Integrations
installation/integrations.description: Bedrock CMMC integrates with various Microsoft 365 and third-party services to provide comprehensive compliance assessments.

intro.title: Welcome to Bedrock CMMC
intro.description: Bedrock CMMC is a comprehensive cybersecurity maturity model certification (CMMC) compliance platform designed to help organizations achieve and maintain CMMC compliance efficiently and effectively.

user-guide/assessments.title: Assessments
user-guide/assessments.description: Assessments are the core feature of Bedrock CMMC, allowing you to evaluate your organization's compliance posture against CMMC requirements.

user-guide/dashboard-overview.title: Dashboard Overview
user-guide/dashboard-overview.description: The Bedrock CMMC dashboard provides a comprehensive, at-a-glance view of your organization's compliance status, security posture, and ongoing activities.

user-guide/notifications.title: Notifications
user-guide/notifications.description: Configure how and when Bedrock CMMC alerts you to important events and compliance changes.

user-guide/remediation.title: Remediation
user-guide/remediation.description: The Remediation module helps you address compliance gaps identified during assessments and track progress toward full CMMC compliance.

user-guide/reporting.title: Reporting
user-guide/reporting.description: Bedrock CMMC provides comprehensive reporting capabilities to communicate compliance status to stakeholders, auditors, and leadership.

user-guide/scheduled-assessments.title: Scheduled Assessments
user-guide/scheduled-assessments.description: Automate your compliance monitoring with scheduled assessments that run at regular intervals.

user-guide/user-management.title: User Management
user-guide/user-management.description: Manage users, roles, and permissions within Bedrock CMMC to ensure appropriate access control.
